com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.card.validation.rules

Class PaymentCardNumberRule.ValidationBuilder

  • com.verygoodsecurity.vgscollect.view.card.validation.rules.PaymentCardNumberRule.ValidationBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    PaymentCardNumberRule

    public static class PaymentCardNumberRule.ValidationBuilder

    This class provides an API for set up rules for validation unknown bank card brands.

    It is recommended if you may have a lot of local or special brands in you system.
